name: Pick-A-Pepper
overview:
Pick-A-Pepper.com connects local farmers, gardeners, and food artisans with local consumers, restaurants and institutions.

With just a few clicks it is possible to purchase ripe, delicious, local goods in small or large quantities at fair prices. Anyone who has a bounty to share can join, free of charge, no matter how large or small–be it a backyard garden, a home kitchen operation, or a hundred acre farm.

Pick-A-Pepper’s interface is extreamly user-friendly and easy to navigate. You won’t see annoying banner adds or distractions.

If you grow it or make it you can sell it for FREE on Pick-A-Pepper. Other sites, like Local Harvest, will charge you 16% of your sales and 6% of shipping. At Pick-A-Pepper we believe that you should keep ALL of your farm or kitchen income.

Vendors have total control over their listing, which includes scheduling, pricing, and quantities. You donâ€™t have to be tied to any particular schedule on Pick-A-Pepper. You set it all up and you can change it whenever you want!

Wholesaling is super easy. Sometimes it is just easier to sell a whole lot of something then to sell one piece at a time. If you are interested in wholesaling, Pick-A-Pepper is the place for you! Restaurants, caterers, grocers, schools and institutions can easily buy from you if you are willing to sell in bulk and deliver!
